meanings.sent1: The incongruousnesses between their opinions led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent2: The incongruousnesses in their musical tastes made it challenging to choose a song.
meanings.sent3: The incongruousnesses in their fashion choices made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The incongruousnesses in their dance styles created a comical scene.
meanings.sent5: The incongruousnesses in their painting techniques were evident to all.

meanings.definition: The state of being inappropriate or out of place
meanings.sent1: The incongruousnesses of his joke at the funeral shocked everyone.
meanings.sent2: The incongruousnesses of her outfit at the formal event raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent3: The incongruousnesses of his loud laughter during the solemn ceremony was awkward.
meanings.sent4: The incongruousnesses of her casual language in a professional meeting was noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The incongruousnesses of his behavior in the library made the librarian frown.
